metadata.feature_description: Display appropriate error messages and handle failures gracefully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Validation Error Display for Invalid Email

steps.expected: Add User form appears with all fields
steps.actual: Add User form appeared with First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Password fields

steps.action: Entered invalid email format 'invalidemail' without @ symbol and clicked Save
steps.actual: Red exclamation mark validation error icon appeared next to Email Address field, form was not submitted

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Error Notification for View Assets (Missing User Folder)

steps.expected: Dropdown menu with user actions appears
steps.actual: Dropdown menu appeared with options including View Profile, View Assets, Change Password, etc.

steps.action: Clicked 'View Assets' for user without any assets
steps.expected: Error notification should display with appropriate message
steps.actual: Error notification appeared with message 'EmptyTest User does not own any assets.' - confirmed in page state before auto-dismiss

steps.expected: Notification should appear and auto-dismiss after approximately 5 seconds
steps.actual: Error notification appeared and auto-dismissed before screenshot could capture it visually, confirming auto-dismiss functionality (code shows 5000ms timer)

steps.action: Filled Add User form with duplicate username 'claudetest'
steps.actual: Form filled with First Name: Duplicate, Last Name: User, User Name: claudetest (existing), Email: duplicate@test.com, Password: Test123456

steps.action: Clicked Save to trigger server-side validation error
steps.expected: Server should return 500 error with user-friendly message
steps.actual: Console showed 500 Internal Server Error. Error notification appeared with message 'The username is already in use.' - confirmed in page state

observations: Error notifications use utilities.notifyError() function with 5000ms (5-second) auto-dismiss timer as confirmed in code review of usersActivity.js
Inline validation errors display red exclamation mark icons next to invalid fields
Server-side errors return HTTP 500 status with user-friendly error messages that are displayed in toast notifications
Error messages are properly formatted with user context (e.g., including username in 'does not own any assets' message)
Console error logging confirmed via browser console messages showing 500 errors for server-side validation failures
Auto-dismiss functionality is working as designed - notifications disappear automatically after the configured timeout
